Sentence.string: I’m here to ask you if you still don’t know Mr Blayton.
No, I still don’t know the guy. How many times do I need to tell you that?
Don’t worry, this was the last time. I’ve found this note in his personal belongings.
Oh yeah I remember now ! I didn’t understand the name of the guy when you asked me. He was a one-of-a-kind customer ! But he wasn’t ordering so much lately. Money problems I think.
I see that you have the memory of a goldfish. How did you react when you realised Marcus was less and less using drugs?
For sure I was angry first. But customers like him come and go. This is not a reason to kill him if it’s what you have in mind.
